chargePointVendor.description: string defining the vendor of the charge point. To be treated as case insensitive.

chargePointModel.description: string defining the model of the charge point. To be treated as case insensitive.

chargePointSerialNumber.description: string defining the serial number of the charge point. To be treated as case insensitive.

chargeBoxSerialNumber.description: string defining the serial number of the charge box. To be treated as case insensitive.

firmwareVersion.description: string defining the firmware version of the charge point. To be treated as case insensitive.

iccid.description: string defining the iccid of the charge point. To be treated as case insensitive.

imsi.description: string defining the imsi of the charge point. To be treated as case insensitive.

meterType.description: string defining the meter type of the charge point. To be treated as case insensitive.

meterSerialNumber.description: string defining the meter serial number of the charge point. To be treated as case insensitive.
